modName: The Lair of Barrog - Player Home
summary: New very detailed hideout in the underground...
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120610/hrl3m6h9.jpg[/IMG]

[youtube]wxn2uR1GOR0[/youtube]

[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120612/hhnepe57.jpg[/IMG]

This mod adds a new player home to Skyrim. It is a very detailed, atmospheric hideout
in the underground and is located in the west of Whiterun.

If there are any bugs please inform me so I can fix them straight away.


[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120612/quj2fgmm.jpg[/IMG]

- Custom Bookcases
- Chopping Block and Wood Storage
- Talos Shrine that cures disease
- Map Marker (fast travel)
- Tanning Rack
- Alchemy Table
- Cooking Area
- Smithing Area
- Enchanting Table
- Navmeshed with idle markers
- 6 Weapon Plaque Displays
- 2 Mannequin
- 6 Dagger Display Case
- Bath
- hidden Safe with Key
- follower sleep place
- garden

[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120612/lldcbn2w.jpg[/IMG]

- Incompatible with mods which have the same entrace location
- If your mannequins move around or armor disappears, try this mod:
  Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652

[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120612/puun3v84.jpg[/IMG]

- Alternate entrance
- Bug fixes

[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120612/w2gdtuiq.jpg[/IMG]

 v1.1

- better entrance
- one more entrance
- lightning fixed
- add ladder
- bookshelf fixed
- optional vampire version

v1.2

- 2 more entrance
- some sounds fixed

[IMG]http://s1.directupload.net/images/120612/id6ze7gd.jpg[/IMG]

- Copy the contents of my mod Data folder into your Skyrim Data folder
- or Use NMM to install

[IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120612/a78x4q9g.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks to the following for their resources:
Blary
For use of his resources:
FoodContainer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14133
OpenBooks - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14134
BookSets - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14135

Oaristys
Modders Resource Pack - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16525
author: Barrog
